scripts.say: I thought you already sank in Midway... Just what are you people?!
We are what you see. In this Sanctuary bestowed upon us by the Creator, we wield unlimited power.
That is, as long as we continue sacrificing exquisite souls... *Giggle*...
You'll never defeat the Grey Ghost with this twisted power that you've gained from betraying your own people! Never!
Silence! Don't you dare utter that name in my presence!
There's no future for you if you cannot face the Grey Ghost! Believe me, you still have a chance if you turn back now...
Enough! It drives me crazy to hear that despicable name repeated! Over and over! I will destroy her... I WILL DESTROY HER MYSELF! AAAGGHHH!
Akagi! ... Words will not save you, Zuikaku! Fight, and prove whether you are weak or strong!
